content:
I’m pursuing a doctoral degree in Computing at the Universitat Polit√®cnica de Catalunya (UPC) in Barcelona. I’m a member of the Software and Service Engineering (GESSI) research group.
In my research, I explore data-driven mechanisms to improve agile software development processes in large organizations. My research interests range from data analytics, machine learning (particularly in NLP) to agile/lean management, organizational structures and processes. I’m advised by Prof. Xavier Franch and Dr. Victor Munt√©s Mulero.
During my professional career I’ve had an opportunity to get exposure to the full end-to-end IT project lifecycle from the implementation as well as coordination perspective. Through these experiences, I’ve gained an in-depth knowledge of IT service delivery and business processes.
summary:
I’m pursuing a doctoral degree in Computing at the Universitat Polit√®cnica de Catalunya (UPC) in Barcelona. I’m a member of the Software and Service Engineering (GESSI) research group.
In my research, I explore data-driven mechanisms to improve agile software development processes in large organizations.

authors: STEM Alliance - Career Sheet - Research Engineer
summary: The STEM Alliance proposes a series of online events (webinars and chat discussions) and career sheets that aim to promote Science, Technology, Engineering and Mathematics (STEM) careers with role models. Representatives from companies ‚Äì partners of the STEM Alliance ‚Äì are invited to give online and written presentations to inform teachers about possible careers in their companies. The career sheet serves as an awareness-raising tool for teachers and career guidance officers, as well as providing valuable information for the companies‚Äô own awareness-raising campaigns. [Link to the interview]
title: STEM Careers and Skills of the Future
